item.title: CVE-2024-0372|2024-02-05T21:21:38.352Z -- aman086 -- views%20for%20wpforms%20%E2%80%93%20display%20%26%20edit%20wpforms%20entries%20on%20your%20site%20frontend
item.description: The Views for WPForms â€“ Display & Edit WPForms Entries on your site frontend plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the 'get_form_fields' function in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access and above, to create form views.
